Detailed Description

Class that contains global methods for accessing the SDK version.

Member Function Documentation

◆ CreateFromConfig()

LogBase IonicSecurity::SDK::LogFactory::CreateFromConfig ( String^  msConfigJson)

Creates a logger from a JSON configuration string.

Parameters
[in]msConfigJsonThe JSON configuration string.
Returns
Returns a pointer to a new logger object if the JSON configuration is valid.

If any error occurs while loading the configuration, an Exception is thrown. In the case of error, the error string can be retrieved from the thrown Exception or by calling LogFactory::GetError().
See also
LogFactory::CreateFromConfigFile()
LogFactory::CreateSimple()
LogFactory::CreateSimpleDelegate()

◆ CreateFromConfigFile()

LogBase IonicSecurity::SDK::LogFactory::CreateFromConfigFile ( String^  msConfigFilePath)

Creates a logger from a JSON configuration file.

Parameters
[in]msConfigFilePathPath to the JSON configuration file.
Returns
Returns a pointer to a new logger object if the JSON configuration is valid.

If any error occurs while loading the configuration, an Exception is thrown. In the case of error, the error string can be retrieved from the thrown Exception or by calling LogFactory::GetError().
See also
LogFactory::CreateFromConfig()
LogFactory::CreateSimple()
LogFactory::CreateSimpleDelegate()

◆ CreateSimple()

LogBase IonicSecurity::SDK::LogFactory::CreateSimple ( String^  msOutputFilePath,
bool  bAppendFile,
LogSeverity  eSeverityLevel 
)

Creates a logger that writes to the provided file path.

Parameters
[in]msOutputFilePathThe output file path to log to.
[in]bAppendFileDetermines if the output log file should be appended to if it already exists.
[in]eSeverityLevelThe minimum severity level of log messages that should be allowed through the logger to be written into the output log file.
Returns
Returns a pointer to a new logger object that writes to the specified file path.

If bAppendFile is set to true, then the log file will be appended to if it already exists. Otherwise, the log file will be overwritten and any existing data at the specified path will effectively be erased.

If any error occurs while creating the logger, an Exception is thrown. In the case of error, the error string can be retrieved from the thrown Exception or by calling LogFactory::GetError().
See also
LogFactory::CreateFromConfig()
LogFactory::CreateFromConfigFile()
LogFactory::CreateSimpleDelegate()

◆ CreateSimpleDelegate()

LogBase IonicSecurity::SDK::LogFactory::CreateSimpleDelegate ( LogDelegate^  delegateLog,
LogSeverity  eSeverity 
)

Creates a logger that sends all log messages to a delegate function.

Parameters
[in]delegateLogA delegate function that will accept all logs at or above the severity.
[in]eSeverityThe minimum severity level of log messages that should be allowed through the logger to be written into the output log file.
Returns
Returns a pointer to a new logger object that writes to the specified file path.

If any error occurs while creating the logger, an Exception is thrown. In the case of error, the error string can be retrieved from the thrown Exception or by calling LogFactory::GetError().
See also
LogFactory::CreateFromConfig()
LogFactory::CreateFromConfigFile()
LogFactory::CreateSimple()

◆ LogDelegate()

delegate int IonicSecurity::SDK::LogFactory::LogDelegate ( LogSeverity  eSeverityLevel,
String^  msOutputFilePath 
)

Delegate prototype for CreateSimpleDelegate log creation function.

Parameters
[in]eSeverityLevelThe severity level of log message.
[in]msOutputFilePathThe log message string
Returns
0 if the log message was consumed, -1 otherwise.

Property Documentation

◆ BaseFileWriterPath

IonicSecurity::SDK::LogFactory::BaseFileWriterPath
getset

The base file writer path used by logger creation functions.

This path is used as the base directory for file writers that are configured with a relative path when creating a logger from configuration via LogFactory::CreateFromConfig() or LogFactory::CreateFromConfigFile(). If the base file writer path is not set, then the current working directory is used by default.

See also
LogFactory::CreateFromConfig()
LogFactory::CreateFromConfigFile()

◆ Error

IonicSecurity::SDK::LogFactory::Error
get

Get the most recent error message string, if any.

Returns
Returns the most recent error message string, if any. The error message will be set during failed calls to any of the logger creation functions (e.g. LogFactory::CreateFromConfig(), LogFactory::CreateFromConfigFile()).

◆ GetInstance

IonicSecurity::SDK::LogFactory::GetInstance
staticget

(DEPRECATED) Get the LogFactory singleton object instance.

Returns
(DEPRECATED) Returns the LogFactory singleton object instance. The returned object can be used to create logger (LogBase) objects.
See also
LogFactory::CreateFromConfig()
LogFactory::CreateFromConfigFile()
LogFactory::CreateSimple()
Deprecated:
This property is deprecated. Its replacement is LogFactory::Instance, which works identically.

◆ Instance

IonicSecurity::SDK::LogFactory::Instance
staticget

Get the LogFactory singleton object instance.

Returns
Returns the LogFactory singleton object instance. The returned object can be used to create logger (LogBase) objects.
See also
LogFactory::CreateFromConfig()
LogFactory::CreateFromConfigFile()
LogFactory::CreateSimple()
